dict.acceptation: 前进地；向前；至将来；提前地；
向前方的；迅速的；（社会、政治）进步的；早熟的；
促进，助长；（按新地址）转寄；发送；

sent.orig: Pull forward, breathe forward, land forward and kick forward.
sent.trans: 向前划水，向前呼吸，向前入水，向前踢腿。

sent.orig: The three players in the front row are called left forward, center forward and right forward.
sent.trans: 前排的三名运动员被称为左前卫、中前卫和右前卫。

sent.orig: He splits 27 minutes power forward and point power forward in a 128-118 victory.
sent.trans: 在27分钟的上场时间里他即充当大前锋又是一名“组织大前锋”，湖人最终以128-118取胜。

sent.orig: Forward handspring has great potentialities in its development among the forward somersault movements in floor exercises.
sent.trans: 前手翻在自由体操前空翻类动作发展方面具有较大的潜力。

sent.orig: Exactly. A forward premium on foreign currency means a forward discount on domestic currency.
sent.trans: 完全正确。外币的远期升水意味着本币的远期就是贴水。
